  <h1>Projects</h1>
  <h2><a href="https://chess.lukasgjetting.dk/">Chess Charts</a></h2>
  <em><a href="https://github.com/lukasgjetting/chess-com-player-sheet">Code</a></em>
  <br />
  <br />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=TypeScript&message=TypeScript&label=&color=007ACC&labelColor=404040" alt="Typescript">z

  <div align="left">
    <p>A weekend project to use the public Chess.com API. Generates a few pretty charts and crunches some numbers.</p>
    <p>If you don't have a Chess.com user, you can try the tool by entering <em>lukasgjetting</em>.</p>
  </div>
  <h2>react-hook-search</h2>
  <em><a href="https://github.com/lukasgjetting/react-hook-search">Code</a></em>
  <br />
  <br />
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=TypeScript&message=TypeScript&label=&color=007ACC&labelColor=404040" alt="Typescript">
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=React&message=React&label=&color=61DAFB&labelColor=404040" alt="React">
  <br />
  <br />
  <div align="left">
    <p>An NPM package to easily add search functionality to your React app..</p>
    <p>You simply provide the hook with a list of objects and a list of properties to search in.</p>
  </div>
